long_description: Designed with belaying in mind, the Black Diamond Super 8 belay device features a versatile dual-hole design that allows use with single or double ropes. Made of lightweight-yet-tough drop-forged aircraft-quality 7075-T6 aluminum for superior strength and durability. Soft-anodized coating wears smoothly; less chance of developing rope-damaging edges. Black Diamond Super 8 belay device comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Designed with belaying in mind, the Black Diamond Super 8 belay device features a versatile dual-hole design that allows use with single or double ropes.
